text: Harold Blaine Lindgren (June 26, 1939 â€“ October 5, 2019) was an American sprinter. He competed mainly in the 110 m hurdles. He won this event at the 1963 Pan American Games. He won a silver medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Lindgren died on October 5, 2019 in Salt Lake City, Utah at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:American sprinters Category:American hurdlers Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Blaine Lindgren
